metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3281 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Django 2.2 before 2.2.18, 3.0 before 3.0.12, and 3.1 before 3.1.6, the django.utils.archive.extract method (used by "startapp --template" and "startproject --template") allows directory traversal via an archive with absolute paths or relative paths with dot segments.

criterions.comment: python-django: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
